title: Providing food to the dead in a dream

preview.html: Or there is a longing in which the heart aches, how can it long for him, so as not to be confused, and you are afraid to think about what this dream holds. Interpretation of seeing food for the deceased in a dream for a single girl When a virgin gives food to the dead and she is happy, this indicates the good luck that she will obtain, God willing. When She offers food in a dream that the girl does not really like to the deceased and does not eat with him in the dream. This indicates that they will lose money, God willing, God knows best. And if an unmarried girl eats with the deceased in a dream, it indicates that she will be fine, and it may be a sign for her that she will not She loses her money, and God knows best. And seeing a girl bringing food to the dead because she is very hungry, this is good news for her that the anxiety will go away. Just like seeing the deceased refusing to eat or eating with them, this is a warning of financial losses. And God knows best. See also: Seeing food in a dream. Interpretation of seeing food for the deceased in a dream for a married woman. Seeing the dead person eating while sitting alone in a far place in this dream indicates the importance of giving him alms and praying constantly. If a woman sees that she is preparing food for her husband, and when she eats, she sees that the dead person He eats with her husband. This also means that it is obligatory to give zakat and pray for the dead, God knows best. And when you see that a woman gave the deceased fresh and ready food, this dream symbolizes that he will get a lot of sustenance, God willing. Seeing an unknown dead person eating food indicates her feeling of loneliness, and God I know. The interpretation of seeing food for the deceased in a dream about the man and its meaning. If the man gives the dead his food, this is good news of his wife’s pregnancy, and God knows best. And seeing that food is offered to the dead and then takes it without taking it back or taking it, this indicates charity and prayers for him. And God knows best. If a deceased man refuses to eat a man’s food in a dream, this is a sign of the problems he faces in the field of work. When a deceased man gives an apple, this indicates that he has lost a lot. The vision of giving apples to the dead may be problems that may arise with him. And if someone gives Dead figs in a dream, this may be a dream. A sign of suffering from an illness or it could be a sign of material loss. God is Most High and Most Knowing. Read also: Interpretation of a dream of a dead person asking for food. The meaning of seeing dead food in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. Seeing food being offered to the deceased and then doing it in A remote place, necessitating the opinion that charity should be given. And God knows best. When a woman offers an inedible orange to a dead person in a dream. This indicates that there are problems that make her sad, and God knows best. With the deceased giving an edible orange, this is an undesirable dream. It may symbolize an incomplete pregnancy, or it may be a breakup. A loved one, or the suffering of God’s illness is higher and more enlightened. If a dead person asks for food from a pregnant woman, she will bring it and give it. This is a sign of the safe arrival of her child, God willing. Interpretation of seeing dead food in a dream for young people and its meaningWhen a young man sees himself in a dream that he is offering food to the dead, this It indicates the abundance of money that he obtains. If a young man buys food in a dream and gives it to the dead person after dawn

title: Interpretation of a dream about my husband's mother dying in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about my husband’s mother who died in a dream in interpretations, but rather by diligent scholars who seek to interpret dreams. Interpretation of a dream about my husband’s mother who died in a dream. Whoever sees in a dream that his husband’s mother died in a dream, perhaps it indicates severe repentance for committing some sins in those days. In the case of seeing the mother of the husband dying in a dream, this may indicate a serious mistake that a person may suffer from during this period, and God knows best. It is possible that seeing the mother of the deceased husband in a dream indicates that things will be facilitated and final during this period, thank God. The husband in a dream may indicate good morals and good treatment between them, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about requesting a divorce from my husband in a dream. Anyone who dreams that she asks for a divorce in a dream may indicate that she was not comfortable at that time. Dreaming about requesting a divorce from her husband in a dream may indicate The intense pressure that you feel during this time, and God knows best. The dream of requesting a divorce from the husband may indicate some serious changes that happen to them during those days. It is possible that the dream of requesting a divorce from the husband in a dream may indicate a change in events, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream My marriage to my husband for the second time in a dream. If a woman sees that her husband got married in a dream, this may indicate her need for family happiness in those days, and God knows best. A husband’s dream of marrying another woman in a dream may indicate the great joy that will come to them during this time. In If you see the husband marrying another woman, this may indicate some crises and problems that this family is going through and that he will get rid of them soon, and God knows best. If he dreams of marrying another woman, this may indicate the blessing and many good things that he will obtain by God’s grace. Interpretation Dreams about my father-in-law harassing me in a dream. In the case of a dream in which the father-in-law appears harassing the owner, the dream may indicate some problems that they are facing during this time. A mother-in-law harassing a woman in a dream may indicate serious family conflicts that she may face in those days. title: Interpretation of an unknown woman in a dream

preview.html: Our article today is about the interpretation of an unknown woman in a dream, one of the dreams that causes desire and fear in the souls of many, but it is not always scary in reality, it carries the same fear in a dream, but on the contrary, it can bring with it many good things.Women An unknown person in a dream is one of the beloved and praiseworthy dreams that carry many good and beautiful connotations and usually indicate a lot of goodness, because the title of a woman is only said to a beautiful woman who controls her affairs. And he knows how to act. Therefore, during our article today, we will shed light on the most important interpretations of Ibn Sirin’s vision of the unknown woman in a dream, according to the difference in the woman’s condition and the dreamer’s condition in detail through the encyclopedia. Follow usInterpretation of an unknown woman in a dreamSeeing a woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a woman in a dream brings with her a lot of goodness and joy, and seeing a woman with beauty in her is a sign of the New Year that brings a lot of goodness, sustenance and joy, and God is Most High and He knows best. As for If he sees in a dream that a beautiful woman enters his house while he is sleeping, this is a sign that there is good news on her way to him, and God knows best. While you saw a woman, but she was overweight or obese, it was a sign that the coming year will be full of joy and good and happy news that the priest awaits. For a long time. While you see a woman who is thin and weighs little, this is an indication that the coming year will be dry and will not bring many changes, events, or joys, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing a strange woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Whoever sees a strange woman in his dream, this is a sign of kindness and abundant livelihood. As for seeing an unknown woman in a single person’s dream, it is a sign of his imminent marriage to a woman of good character, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. An unmarried woman dreaming of an unknown woman indicates her marriage or engagement to someone he loves. Seeing a woman younger than the woman’s age is evidence that the enemy is pursuing her, and God knows best. While seeing an old woman in a dream is a sign that the dreamer is suffering from a lack of luck, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Seeing an unknown woman in a single woman’s dream. Scientists and the majority of interpreters have agreed that seeing an unknown woman in a dream for a girl who has not been married before is evidence of abundant sustenance and kindness. It is a sign that the unmarried woman or unmarried woman will soon marry, by God’s command, to a partner who loves her, protects her, and provides for her, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about an unknown woman being chased by a stranger in a dream, a girl or a young man, symbolizes a happy marriage and happy news, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Seeing an unknown woman in a dream MarriedIbn Sirin believes that the unknown woman in a married woman’s dream is a sign of goodness and well-being for her, or the fulfillment of a long-awaited wish or wish, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. The unknown woman in a married woman’s dream, if she is smiling and beautiful, may indicate a new pregnancy, if the wife She has delayed her pregnancy. If the husband is suffering from a financial problem, then a strange wife is a sign

title: Learn about the interpretation of eating berries in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Eating berries in a dream is one of the good and benign visions that heralds an abundance of goodness and comfort because it expresses the comfort that facilitates all of his work for the pioneer and enables him to achieve his dreams. Another good sign that can be interpreted differently is whether the berries are red, black, or white. Eating berries in a dream by Ibn SirinEating berries in a dreamThe interpretation of a dream about eating berries mostly indicates justice and success in life, as well as prosperity and prosperity in life that will be available to the dreamer in The future. Many opinions also agree that the viewer enjoys good physical health and strong physical condition, which makes him happy with his life and practices his work and the activities he loves as he wishes. Also, eating red berries greedily may express the dreamer’s feeling of wanting to start a serious emotional relationship to create a family of his own. And having a happy and stable married life. If someone feeds him berries slowly and comfortably, this indicates the presence of someone who loves him very much and cares for him and wants to get close to him, communicate with him, and spend his future with him. But if he sees that the fruits are in front of him in abundance, or they have fallen from the tree, this indicates The goodness and blessings that will overwhelm the dreamer in the coming season without calculation, limit or fatigue. But if he eats a large amount of white berries, this indicates that the dreamer is a religious person who loves his religion and is loyal to it and performs all rituals and worship with great commitment. If in reality the dreamer suffers from A serious crisis or anxiety that he is facing, then this dream will be a relief from his crisis and the end of his suffering, well-being and happiness after fatigue and worries. Your dream will find its interpretation in seconds. Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site from Google. Eating berries in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that eating berries in a dream is one of the happy and good dreams that bring all Good and good news for the dreamer in the near future (God willing). If he eats berries greedily, this indicates that the coming days will be very happy and he will witness many joyful events that will come in a row and without stopping. If the dreamer is single and sees someone feeding him a variety of Berries, this means that he will soon marry the person he loves and be happy with him for a happy and stable married life dominated by love and honesty. Eating berries in a dream for a single woman. The interpretation of this vision depends on many factors, such as the shape and color of the berries and the amount of them eaten, but they often carry good signs and omens. Happy. If she greedily eats a large amount of red berries, this is a sign that she is living a beautiful love story full of emotions, in which she feels happy and reassured. If she eats white berries, this indicates that she will soon be crowned with a wealthy person who will provide her with a future life full of prosperity and stability. While eating Cranberries are a sign that she has achieved great success in one of the fields, and this will be a reason for her to join a prestigious job that will bring her huge profits. Eating blueberries indicates a state of calm and comfort after these recent crises have passed peacefully and all the problems they suffered from have ended.

title: What is the interpretation of roses in a dream and seeing a rose farm in a dream?

preview.html: Dreaming about roses denotes happy news, abundance of money, and other interpretations that we will interpret for single people, married people, pregnant women, divorced women, and men, such as seeing white roses or a bouquet of red roses. Buying rose flowers or a gift of yellow roses for Imam Al-Sadiq, Ibn Sirin and others. In continuation of the topic: Interpretation of roses in a dream. Roses in a dream are an honorable person, or a child, or an absent person, or a woman, and whoever sees that he is planting roses, it is a joy for marriage and children. Whoever sees that he is picking Roses attain dignity, love, and grace. Whoever collects white roses from heaven, then kisses a pious woman, has a pregnant woman, and it is said that the rose shows the woman leaving. Or death, or trade that goes awry, or joy that does not last, or a covenant that is not kept. Whoever sees a young man giving him a rose is making a covenant that will not last for him. And whoever sees a wreath of roses on his head, if he is single, he will get married, and likewise if a woman sees him, A happy rose is a flower of the world and has no permanence, and roses look good. Arsenic and rose oil show intelligence, clarity of mind, closeness to people, tenderness on the side, roses show joy and pleasure, and if the sick person sees roses spreading under him or wearing him or wearing a dress from them, then he will die. After forty days, that is the duration of the rose’s stay. It is said that a rose represents the arrival of a traveler or the arrival of a book, but if a rose has its tree cut down, it represents grief and grief. Perhaps the white rose indicates dirhams, the red rose indicates dinars, and the red rose indicates controversy. Roses in a dream are an honorable man, or a young man. , or a coming person, or a woman, and whoever sees that he is a genie and a rose, he will be honored and loved. Roses: the son or honor of money, and it was said that roses indicate the absence of roses or the arrival of a book. It has been said that a rose represents a woman who departs, a child who dies, a trade that does not last, or a joy that departs, due to the lack of survival of the rose. Whoever dreams that a young man gives him a flower, then his enemy gives him a covenant that he will not fulfill. Whoever dreams that he has a wreath of roses on his head, he will marry a woman and separation between them will occur soon. If a woman sees this, she will have a husband with this quality. And the happy rose, the flower of the world without strength or survival. Cutting the rose bush is sadness, collecting roses is joy, and collecting white from his garden is kissing his chaste wife. If the roses are red, then his wife is cheerful and cheerful. If the roses are yellow, then she is a sick woman. Picking unopened rose buds is evidence of a woman’s miscarriage. It was said that the rose is a good male. And whoever collects a large rose whose leaves are known, she accepts them very much. For the beautiful and beautiful woman whom every man loves, she drops the ugly thing, and she is innocent of it: A group of expressions said: The wind is few and many of them are anxiety and sadness. Seeing a branch of a lush Damask rose and in full bloom, it means that there will be A wedding is coming soon in your family and high hopes will come true. If your lover puts this flower in your hair, this foretells that you will be a victim of deception. If a woman receives a bouquet of damask roses in the spring, she will find a loyal lover. But if you do

title: All meanings of the interpretation of a dream about a person cutting my hair according to Ibn Sirin, in good and evil

preview.html: Here in this article, the interpretation of a dream about someone cutting my hair. None of us wants to take care of our hair and take care of it in order to get an attractive appearance for it, so many want to cut it for a long time at the right time as a kind of change and give its owner a new look, but what do you dream about cutting hair? ? What are the implications of seeing someone cutting the dreamer's hair in a dream? The answers to these questions depend on the details of the dream, gender, and marital status of the dreamer, as well as the identity of the person who cuts his hair in the dream, which we will present in detail throughout the lines of this article. In the Encyclopedia.Interpretation of a dream about someone cutting my hair. Cutting hair in a dream generally indicates that the dreamer wants to change his current situation and rebel against it. A dream about cutting hair from the sideburns indicates that the dreamer will fail in his studies or work. As for the one who sees in his dream that he is cutting his hair in the middle, His vision indicates that he desires to increase his knowledge and understanding. If a person sees in a dream that he is cutting his hair at the back, this means that he is in dire need of money as a result of the crisis he went through. A man’s dream of cutting his hair indicates that in reality he is suffering from accumulated debts. And financial problems. Seeing the dreamer’s hair had been cut by another person and it was beautiful after the cut, means that the dreamer will receive benefit from this person in reality. When one sees someone cutting his hair in his dream but is not satisfied with the haircut, this is a sign that someone He will deceive him and treat him for a long time. One of the most promising visions for a man is his dream of a beautiful woman cutting his hair. If the woman who cuts his hair in the dream is his wife, this means that she is a fair woman and will be suitable for overcoming problems both at the work level and at the life level. If he The dreamer is single and sees in his dream that there is a beautiful girl cutting his hair, then the dream is good news for him that he will marry a beautiful girl who will make him happy. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about someone cutting his hairThe dream interpretation scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin says: If a person sees in his dream that someone completely cuts his hair His vision indicates that there is an evil person who is stealing and harming him. Whoever sees in his dream that someone he loves is gently cutting his hair to give him a new look, then this vision indicates that there is someone who cares about the dreamer’s affairs and cares for him and will help him succeed in life. As for the dream that someone cuts The dreamer felt violence and violence, this indicates that there is someone who imposes his authority on the dreamer and prevents him from living his life the way he wants and hurts him severely. This dream could be a warning to its owner that there is someone waiting for him or harming a member of his family. Seeing a friend cutting the fortuneteller’s hair indicates the love of this person. The friend of the fortuneteller and his defense of him and his efforts to ward off any harm from him. If one sees in a dream that there are several people cutting his hair, the vision indicates that he always does good and wants charity for the needy and that he is generous and generous. If the person who cuts the dreamer’s hair is his life partner, then this It means that the dreamer does not feel comfortable with this partner and does not feel love towards him. However, if the person who cuts the dreamer’s hair in the dream is disliked by him, this indicates that there is

title: Interpretation of a dream about driving a car in the front seat for a divorced woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about driving a car in the front seat for a divorced woman: It is a happy dream that does not cause panic or anxiety, as long as the dreamer does not suffer any harm in the dream, and we find that the dream differs if she is driving with her ex-husband or with any other person or even just her, so get together. Interpreters to clarify all the concepts and clarify the pros and cons during the article. Interpretation of a dream about driving a car in the front seat for a divorced woman. The vision represents the dreamer entering a happy new life, especially if he is riding with someone and is happy, then the vision will be happy. The dreamer who sees her ex-husband driving her in the car, then this Definite evidence that she will return to him again, especially if she feels comfortable and happy, and the vision is also an indication of a significant increase in her salary in terms of financial stability and freedom from psychological damage. If the dreamer is racing with her ex-husband and she is miserable and sad, this leads her to discomfort in her life She accepts many things against her will with the desire to raise her children, as this is contrary to her vision when she is. She is happy at that time, and the vision expresses comfort and blessing in her life, and relief from adversity, no matter how severe. Interpretation of a dream about driving a car in the front seat for a divorced woman by Ibn Sirin. Our imam Ibn Sirin believes that driving a car for a divorced woman varies depending on the appearance and condition of the dreamer. She was sad in her sleep, so this indicates her feeling of loneliness as a result of her separation from her husband, but she must get out of this feeling and not continue to submit to it. Our great commentator Ibn Sirin mentioned that a divorced woman driving an elegant car is evidence of her high status at work and her life without pressure and anxiety in The future, and they will be able to achieve their goals and will not fall. For any harm in the future, it will be a great success and good compensation. If the dreamer drives the car brilliantly, this indicates her ability to achieve all her dreams and aspirations regardless of her situation. Interpretation of a dream about driving in a car in the front seat for a divorced woman with her ex-wife. If the dreamer drives with her husband The ex and drives it well, this represents her return to him with love and stability, as she knows the mistakes of the past and tries to avoid them in the next life, and if the car is in good condition. . It indicates comfort, stability, and escape from worry and anxiety. We find that seeing a luxurious and expensive car is evidence of the dreamer’s stability and enjoyment of the happiness that she sought, as she achieved her dreams and formed a happy family full of happiness, love, and understanding. If the dreamer is in pain or fatigue, he will soon recover and live his life without pain or harm.Interpretation of driving a car in the front seat with someone I know about a divorced womanDriving the dreamer with a man known to the dreamer is a happy vision. If the car is new and the dreamer feels comfortable while driving it, then the vision expresses her marriage to this person and settling down with him and not falling into any arguments or quarrels, but rather living in a wonderful psychological and material condition. If the car is black, this does not mean that it is good, but rather it strengthens

title: Interpretation of an earring in a dream by Ibn Sirin, losing a neck in a dream and wearing an earring in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the neck in Al-Manamiri, the translators’ interpretation, is that this vision carries many good tidings for the dreamer, and in the lines of this article we will talk about the interpretation of the neck vision for single people, married people, pregnant women, and men, according to the lips of Ibn Sirin and senior scholars. From its interpretation. Interpretation of the neck in a dream by Ibn Sirin. What is the interpretation of the neck in a dream? The dream indicates that the dreamer has a sweet voice, loves to sing, and enjoys listening to songs. However, if his neck is decorated with pearls, this indicates the effort that the dreamer is making in memorizing the Qur’an. And recite it in the correct way. Seeing the neck with one ear and the other empty symbolizes an incomplete work, or a good deed and not completing it, or honoring one of the parents and not obeying the other. If a married man sees his wife wearing an earring of gold mixed with silver in his dream, this indicates the emergence of important disputes between them. It may lead to divorce if each of them does not control their anger when dealing with the other. If the dreamer sees a silver earring in his dream, this indicates that he is a good person who seeks to gain the satisfaction of God (the Most High), so he approaches Him with good deeds and stays away from everything. Who forbade or prohibited. To get the correct interpretation, do a search on Google, the Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site. Interpretation of the neck in a dream by Ibn SirinIf the dreamer sees himself wearing an earring, this foretells that he will soon hear news that will make him happy when he hears it. If the dreamer sees a golden earring in his dream and Married, his vision soon foretells the good news of his wife’s pregnancy, as gold symbolizes male procreation and indicates that his future child will be beautiful and wonderful. A pearl earring shows an abundance of sustenance and blessing in money and predicts to the dreamer that he will earn a lot of money soon in an easy and unexpected way. Interpretation of the neck in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried woman sees a young man offering her a golden ring in her dream, this means that she will marry a handsome and kind-hearted man. With good manners and you will fall in love with him at first sight and live a more beautiful life with him. days. Of her life. If the dreamer sees herself wearing a silver earring in the dream, this means that there is more than one man who will propose marriage to her soon, and the dream carries a message telling her to think carefully when she chooses one of them to be her. . Her life. Partner. If the dreamer is currently living a love story and sees herself in a dream wearing a beautiful earring that highlights her beauty, the dream suggests that her lover will propose to her soon. Seeing the fiancée protruding her neck from her ears indicates that there are many problems and disagreements between her and her fiancé in the future. The coming period is due to misunderstandings and differences of opinions, and this may lead to the cancellation of the engagement if you do not find a suitable solution. Buying a necklace in a dream for a single woman is an indication of fateful changes in her life that will soon affect her positively, and if the dreamer sees herself buying a golden earring, this means that she feels hesitant. Regarding a specific matter, the dream prompts her to seek advice from someone she trusts in this matter to relieve the tension resulting from hesitation. The dream indicates the presence of a loyal friend in the dreamer’s life who always urges her to do what is right.

title: Interpretation of seeing Eid day in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the Eid day in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam Al-Sadiq. Scientists and jurists interpreted dreams and visions through the vision website roy2a.com. Married women, pregnant women, men, young men, and divorced women. What is the interpretation of seeing the Eid day in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? Seeing the Eid day in a dream according to Ibn Sirin indicates the introduction of joy and happiness into the heart of the dreamer. Seeing the Eid in a dream is a sign of the dreamer’s success and excellence through studying and obtaining the highest degree. Seeing the joy of Eid in a dream indicates the approaching death of anguish, sadness, and relief. Seeing the Eid day in a dream by Ibn Sirinbayan repaying the debt and stabilizing his financial situation. See also: Interpretation of seeing the Eid sacrifices in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing the Eid day in a dream by Ibn Shaheen? Seeing the Eid day in A dream by Ibn Shaheen is a sign of feeling true joy and happiness. Seeing Eid in a dream indicates the stability of the dreamer’s circumstances and the death of the anguish and sorrow of his life. Seeing Eid al-Adha in a dream is an indication of large debts and the inability to pay. Seeing an unknown holiday in a dream is an indication of extreme poverty, deteriorating health, and lack of financial resources. Seeing The day of Ashura in a dream is a sign to bring kindness, sustenance, and blessings. See also: Interpretation of seeing the takbeers of Eid in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing Eid in a dream for Al-Nabulsi? Seeing the day of Eid in a dream from Nabulsi is an indication of the disappearance of worry and sadness and the introduction of happiness into the heart of the dreamer. Seeing a sinner on the day of Eid in a dream is a reference to Seeking sincere repentance, seeking forgiveness, and returning to God Almighty. Seeing Eid al-Adha in a dream is a sign of liberation from loss and trouble. Seeing a prisoner on Eid is a sign of losing pain and releasing him. See also: Interpretation of seeing Eid coming in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing Eid in a dream for Al-Osaimi? Seeing Eid vacation in a dream Al-Osaimi is a sign of salvation from destruction and the collapse of problems after a long period of fatigue and extreme sadness. Seeing the Eid night in the dreamer’s dream is a site for hearing happy and good news. Seeing Eid al-Adha stopping in a dream is an indication of the imminent trick and the loss of sadness from the dreamer’s life. See also: Interpretation of seeing an injured hand in a dream. What is it? Interpretation of seeing the Eid in a dream for a single girl? Seeing the Eid day in a dream for a single girl expresses a feeling of happiness, joy, and family stability with her husband. Seeing the Eid broken in a single woman’s dream: Solve her problems and remove the sorrows from her life. Seeing a single girl in a dream on Eid Al-Adha is a sign of her happy, full life. With joy and happiness. Seeing people in a dream on the day of Eid in a dream is a sign of the coming of happiness and joy and her fiancé’s efforts to live a decent life and achieve prosperity for her. See also: Interpretation of seeing the inscription on cakes in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a married woman in a dream on the day of Eid in a dream? Seeing a married woman in a dream Eid day in a dream is a sign to alleviate worries and sorrows. Seeing a married woman on the Eid holiday in a dream is an indication of family stability and achieving everything she desires and prays to God. What is the interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman in a dream on Eid day?
